title: BMMJ08
description: Low Water Flow detected in water flow switch. Reason & Remedy
reasons_remedies: The chilled water supply is off while the machine is running.
Switch on the chilled water supply if needed."
The setting of the water flow monitor is not correct.
Check the water flow monitor setting.
Set water flow monitor as per requirement.
? Refer to Chapter "Maintenance" > Section "Setting the Water Flow Monitor."
The dust accumulated inside the chilled water supply pipes.
Check water quality and take corrective action.
text_for_embedding:
Error Code BMMJ08
Error Code 08
Category: BMMJ
Title: BMMJ08
Alarm Message: Low Water Flow
Description: Low Water Flow detected in water flow switch. Reason & Remedy
Reason & Remedy:
1. The chilled water supply is off while the machine is running.
2. Check the chilled water supply.
3. Switch on the chilled water supply if needed."
4. The setting of the water flow monitor is not correct.
5. Check the water flow monitor setting.
6. Set water flow monitor as per requirement.
7. ? Refer to Chapter "Maintenance" > Section "Setting the Water Flow Monitor."
8. The pressure switch is faulty.
9. Replace the pressure switch.
10. The dust accumulated inside the chilled water supply pipes.
11. Clean chilled water supply pipes.
12. Check water quality and take corrective action.
Visual References:
- Waterflow sensor image
- Waterflow sensor image
